summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1769, for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from Seventh Avenue South to Sixth Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, by constructing a bridge on each side of the street sixteen (16) feet in width, with walks twelve (12) feet in width, from the property line, under Ordinance No. 18668 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
